quest.name: A Vote for Astrid
journal:
Astrid is eager to prove that she is the one most deserving of your support.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

You speak with Astrid, and inform her that it is her proposal that has earned your vote of confidence. Clearly overjoyed by this development, she sprints off to report to her sister Lisette, and eagerly encourages you to follow her.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Though she professes to remain impartial, the smile on Lady Lisette's face betrays her delight that you have chosen to throw your support behind her dear sister. The contest is far from over, however, as many votes remain to be counted. You resolve to enjoy the festivities as you wait for Lady Lisette and her colleagues to declare a victor.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that once you accept this quest, you will be unable to accept the quests “A Vote for Bert” and “A Vote for Rodrigault.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, be aware that only votes cast during the designated voting period will count towards the final tally.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I knew it! You've come to lend your support to me, have you not?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text:
You can only vote once.
What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You have my support.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What is it that you propose again?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'd like to have a moment to think things over.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Thank you, my friend─I knew I could count on you! Sister has trained me well. I am quite confident that my astute advice is just what our man needs to cast the worries from his heart and find the true love he seeks.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Well, then. Shall we return to the amphitheatre and share the good news with Lisette? She will be so proud of me─of this, I am sure!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: ...I understand all too well. You have only one chance to make your vote, and you would be certain it is the right one, yes? I appreciate your diligence in the matter. Put simply, I mean to suggest to our friend that he expand his horizons.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: It is clear, both from talking to the man himself and from what others say of him, that he has a sterling reputation as a leader and a strong pillar of his community.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: And yet, precisely because he holds a position of import and influence, it is likely not easy for him to find what he seeks at his place of employment.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: And yet, not having any real interests to speak of outside of his duties, our man's options are sadly limited. That is why I propose that he begin his search for his love among his clients─those who know him well enough to appreciate his strong character, but are not so close as to make such engagement uncomfortable.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: A most inspired idea, do you not agree? I trust that now I can count on your support?

dialogue.name: BERT
dialogue.text: I am not such a petty man as to begrudge you your right to cast your lot with another. But mark my words─you will regret not backing the winning chocobo when Bert the Beloved's proposal carries the day!

dialogue.name: RODRIGAULT
dialogue.text: It is most regrettable that I was unable to convince you of the merits of my case. Still, I am confident that the vast majority will see reason and cast their votes in my favor.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Are mine eyes to be believed? Have you truly decided to cast your lot with my beloved sister?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Then so be it! Far be it from me to play favorites, but I must admit I take no small degree of pride and pleasure in this turn of events. Congratulations, my dear Astrid─Forename's vote is yours, and I daresay it will go far.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Mind you, it is far too early to declare the contest won. There are countless other adventurers and Gridanian citizens who have yet to weigh in, after all. When the final results have been counted and compiled, pray speak with me anew.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: As an added incentive, it has been decided that once the victor is declared, the town will be redecorated with new ornaments of their choosing. Pray look forward to it, my dear friend!
